but sometimes i feel alone in these streets it gets cold in these streets my heart and soul on these streets i lost my mom so i hold to a piece of a place of a time when we both intertwined it was love for a fatherless son although he had love for a son visits were none to seldom i would sit on a porch till the mail come and when it came there never was a letter with my name but moms was there for me she held it down cause she cared for me she never left even in her last path where she slept next to death she was always at her best never stressed thats why i love her
